name: TDS (Dorobo)
description:
The world is overrun with oversized bugs, few survivors are left. It's up to you to clear out the swarm and survive.  Fight 3 enemy types and 2 different bosses, use 4 different weapons, and 3 unique boosts to help you in battle.

Play through 5 levels and ~30 minutes of gameplay in this top-down shooter style game, earning rewards, leveling up, and unlocking new equipment  such as weapons and boosts.  As short and basic as it is, I hope you get some enjoyment out of it!

Development Status

I made this game as a way to improve my game dev skills, I have no plans to update this game unless I have spare time or it needs an important bug fix. If you guys really like it or more than just a few people play this then I will consider adding more content, otherwise I'll be working on my next project which will be a bit more of a serious one.

Recommended Specs

Potato, literally a 90 MB game

Credits

All music tracks in this game were produced by Grahf. A New Beginning, Road to Nowhere, Home That Became Hell. These tracks are licensed under a CC BY-SA 4.0 International License.
All non music audio tracks in this game are distributed under a CC0 license from Freesound, dedicated to the public domain.
Roboto: © 2011, Christian Robertson. Apache License.
All assets other than the ones listed above were created by Dorobo.

Note

This game was not tested on Mac or Linux, these download files should work and you should be able to launch the game (on Mac it may be tricky), but I can't guarantee it. If you do play on one of those platforms, feel free to let me know how it works so I can update this page.
